title: DER ANFANG VOM ENDE (Sola)
description: "They say let love begin, let the war begin but we say the time has come."Nara is a warrior of one of the most powerful and feared Murisa kingdom there have ever been. She has never been happier to serve in the military and as a member of the Elite until the greatest ally turns into her kingdomâ€™s greatest enemy. Prospects of a devastating war become a frightening reality. Nara's will and loyalty are tested when she is thrust into the middle of new alliances between her kingdom and Prince Calemir's elven kingdom. This new alliance's foundation is built on a dark past. Both kingdom's eye each other with mistrust and hostility. Nevertheless, they must decide fast to stand together or decide each for their own as dark chaos looms even closer.
author: Juliet Lili
